title: Genie

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a non-Coven player each day and offer three random wishes to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All three wishes must be distinct.
- The wishes will be shown to the target once the night begins, and must be chosen before the target is allowed to use any ability.
- With the Necronomicon, the target will always take a Basic Attack at the end of the night. If they chose the Wish to deal themselves a Basic Attack, they'll instead unknowingly take a Powerful Attack.
- Wishes that would have no effect cannot be chosen. For example, a player cannot be offered a "Get Roleblocked for tonight" wish if they're RB Immune or lack night abilities.
- Your ability will fail if you would be forced to target a Coven member for any reason.
- You will learn what your target(s) chose at the end of the night.

fields.name: Wishes:
fields.value:
- Get Roleblocked for tonight.
- Lose half (rounded up) uses from each of your limited-use abilities.
- Allow the Genie an additional use of their ability each day, permanently.
- Permanently increase the Genie's defense tier.
- Hit yourself with a Basic Attack that ignores your passive defense if you have any.
- Randomly disable one of your abilities for two nights and two days.
- Take a Powerful Poison (Post 85)
- Permanently lose all immunities that you currently have.
- Become unable to vote in the next phase.
- Allow the Genie to secretly submit another vote each day, permanently.
- Mute yourself in all game chats except your own player chat for tomorrow and the next night.
- Grant a Necronomicon to a Coven player that lacks one, even if one already exists.

desc:
Post 1682
*Will give you three wishes. And you'll like it.*
